comment._content: Burial chamber of Kheops - Red granite sarcophagus near Western wall cluttered with graffiti - www.ancient-egypt.org/index.html -

comment.author: 12916508@N00
comment._content: The Sarcophagus within the King's Chamber of the Great Pyramid.  Interestingly, no one was ever  buried here.  The interior volume of the sarcophagus is equal to the volume of the sarcophagus itself.

comment.author: 22466178@N02
comment._content: I often wonder how many people "camped out" in there  prior to government regulating
